long_description: The wind-resistant Manzella Vapor gloves wick moisture and dry fast to keep your hands comfortable on your active winter adventures. Polyester/spandex blend provides four-way stretch, making the gloves ideal for skiing, cold-weather cycling and other active sports. The Manzella Vapor gloves have grippy material on the palms. Overstock.
short_description: The wind-resistant Manzella Vapor gloves wick moisture and dry fast to keep your hands comfortable on your active winter adventures.
